name: Orb Garden
description:
Orb Garden is a 2D puzzle platformer with a focus on bounce flow.

 Take control of Cave Carrot, a humble cavern gardener, as you attempt to explore the lush caves around your research hub in order to find creatures willing to call your garden home.

 Whilst Cave Carrot may be weak he can utilize his registered orbs abilities: allowing him to fuse objects together, leap to great heights, build organic bridges, and unlock the cavern's secrets.

https://github.com/Cyborgdude/Orb-Garden
